name: exposure
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's exposure to specific risk factors.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider

fields.name: smoking_status
fields.description: Smoking status of a patient at the time of the data collection

fields.name: smoking_pack_years
fields.description: Number of packs of cigarettes per day multiplied by the number of years donor smoked

meta.notes: Not required if smoking history is unknown or if the donor never smoked. Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes (20 cigarettes per pack) smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

fields.name: alcohol_status
fields.description: Current alcohol consumtion based on recommended daily limit

codeList: Alcohol intake within recommended daily limit
Alcohol intake exceeds recommended daily limit

meta.notes: Refer to the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, for men, no more than 15 drinks a week, with no more than 3 drinks a day most days. No more than 4 drinks on any single occasion. For women, no more than 10 drinks a week, with no more than 2 drinks a day most days. No more than 3 drinks on any single occasion.
Forward Sortaion Area (FSA) is the 3 first digits of the postal code
